CustomField.description: Number of days between date agreement was today, if not returned as yet. Esle number of days between returned and sent.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Apttus__Other_Party_Returned_Date__c ), TODAY () - Apttus__Other_Party_Sent_Date__c , Apttus__Other_Party_Returned_Date__c - Apttus__Other_Party_Sent_Date__c )
CustomField.label: Outstanding Days
